name: Elijah Arbee
description: Coming from a rich blend of Native American, African-American, and Filipino heritage, I grew up in an environment where higher education was not the norm. However, this background instilled in me the values of resilience, dedication, and perseverance from a young age. Harnessing these qualities, I built a successful solar sales business. Today, my journey has expanded into the tech industry. I am passionate about coding, learning new technologies, and working on innovative projects. With a strong background in sales and customer success management, I bring a customer-centric approach and strategic thinking to every endeavor.
